languages.text: [Обратиться к гвардейцам] "Решите здесь и сейчас, кто вы — верные дети Империума или предатели, одурманенные еретиком?"
[Address the Guardsmen] "Make the decision here and now: are you loyal children of the Imperium, or are you traitors befuddled by a heretic?"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к гвардейцам] "Решите здесь и сейчас, кто вы — верные дети Империума или предатели, одурманенные еретиком?"

languages.text: [Dirigirte a la Guardia] «Tomen su decisión aquí y ahora: ¿son hijos leales del Imperium o son traidores engañados por un hereje?».
languages.original_text: [Address the Guardsmen] "Make the decision here and now: are you loyal children of the Imperium, or are you traitors befuddled by a heretic?"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a la Guardia] «Tomen su decisión aquí y ahora: ¿son hijos leales del Imperium o son traidores engañados por un hereje?».

languages.text: [对所有帝国卫队士兵开口]“做决定的时候到了：你们是帝国忠诚的子民，还是被这个异端分子洗脑的叛徒？”
languages.original_text: [Address the Guardsmen] "Make the decision here and now: are you loyal children of the Imperium, or are you traitors befuddled by a heretic?"

traits.locale_text: [对所有帝国卫队士兵开口]“做决定的时候到了：你们是帝国忠诚的子民，还是被这个异端分子洗脑的叛徒？”

languages.text: [ガーズマンに話しかける]「今ここで決定せよ。君は帝国の忠実なる子どもなのか、それとも異端者に惑わされた裏切り者なのか？」
languages.original_text: [Address the Guardsmen] "Make the decision here and now: are you loyal children of the Imperium, or are you traitors befuddled by a heretic?"

traits.locale_text: [ガーズマンに話しかける]「今ここで決定せよ。君は帝国の忠実なる子どもなのか、それとも異端者に惑わされた裏切り者なのか？」

languages.text: [Interpeller les gardes] « Faites votre choix ici et maintenant : êtes-vous de fidèles enfants de l'Imperium, ou bien des traîtres dévoyés par un hérétique ? »
languages.original_text: [Address the Guardsmen] "Make the decision here and now: are you loyal children of the Imperium, or are you traitors befuddled by a heretic?"

traits.locale_text: [Interpeller les gardes] « Faites votre choix ici et maintenant : êtes-vous de fidèles enfants de l'Imperium, ou bien des traîtres dévoyés par un hérétique ? »

languages.text: [Muhafızlara seslen] "Kararınızı şimdi, burada verin: İmparatorluk'un sadık çocukları mısınız yoksa bir sapkının aklını bulandırdığı hainler mi?"
languages.original_text: [Address the Guardsmen] "Make the decision here and now: are you loyal children of the Imperium, or are you traitors befuddled by a heretic?"

traits.locale_text: [Muhafızlara seslen] "Kararınızı şimdi, burada verin: İmparatorluk'un sadık çocukları mısınız yoksa bir sapkının aklını bulandırdığı hainler mi?"

languages.text: [Die Gardisten ansprechen] "Trefft Eure Wahl. Hier und jetzt. Seid Ihr loyale Kinder des Imperiums oder von einem Ketzer berauschte Verräter?"
languages.original_text: [Address the Guardsmen] "Make the decision here and now: are you loyal children of the Imperium, or are you traitors befuddled by a heretic?"
